name: df-of
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0
body: |- wceq(cof(c0), cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
comment: Define the function operation map. The definition is designed so that if ` R ` is a binary operation, then ` oF R ` is the analogous operation on functions which corresponds to applying ` R ` pointwise to the values of the functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jul-2014.)
